plot: A group of modern Brooklyn beatniks takes in a down on his luck wall street analyst and unwittingly bring a world of secrets and espionage crashing down on their heads.
plot_en: A group of modern Brooklyn beatniks takes in a down on his luck wall street analyst and unwittingly bring a world of secrets and espionage crashing down on their heads.

title: Flipsters
